definition: The rise and fall of the nation concerns everyone (idiom). Everyone bears responsibility for the prosperity of society.
pinyin: guo2 jia1 xing1 wang2 , pi3 fu1 you3 ze2

definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased
variant of 匹[pi3]/classifier for cloth: bolt
classifier for horses, mules etc/Taiwan pr. [pi1]/ordinary person/classifier for cloth: bolt/horsepower
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
